dataObject.content: U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday said a decision by House Democrats to pursue articles of impeachment against him means that future presidents will routinely face impeachment threats from lawmakers.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"Everything there is probably easilly verifiable because it's some declaration from the president Trumb. Unbiased"}
{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Biased. The text states that only Democrats are against Trump and is linking this political party to future parliamentary impeachments."}
